definition: A global computer network providing a variety of information and communication facilities.
example: I searched for the information on the internet.

definition: The programs and other operating information used by a computer.
The physical parts of a computer system.
example: The hardware was damaged in the flood.

definition: Central Processing Unit - the primary component of a computer that acts as its ""control center"".
example: The CPU is the brain of the computer.

definition: Random Access Memory - a type of computer memory that can be accessed randomly.
example: I need more RAM for my computer.
